org.jetel.component

Class AbstractTransformTL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.AbstractTransformTL
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transform
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PartitionTL, RecordDenormalizeTL, RecordGenerateTL, RecordNormalizeTL, RecordRollupTL, RecordTransformTL

    public abstract class AbstractTransformTL
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transform
    Base class of all TL wrapper classes.

      • preExecute

        public void preExecute()
                throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Description copied from interface: Transform
        Called during each graph run before the transform is executed. May be used to allocate and initialize resources required by the transform. All resources allocated within this method should be released by the Transform.postExecute() method.
        Specified by:
        preExecute in interface Transform
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - if an error occurred during resource allocation and initialization

      • postExecute

        public void postExecute()
                 throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Description copied from interface: Transform
        Called during each graph run after the entire transform was executed. Should be used to free any resources allocated within the Transform.preExecute() method.
        Specified by:
        postExecute in interface Transform
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - if an error occurred during resource clean-up

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Description copied from interface: Transform
        Called to report any user-defined error message if an error occurred during the transform.
        Specified by:
        getMessage in interface Transform
        Returns:
        a user-defined error message if an error occurred

      • finished

        @Deprecated
public void finished()
        Deprecated. Use postExecute() method.
        Description copied from interface: Transform
        Called at the end of the transform after all input data records were processed.
        Specified by:
        finished in interface Transform

      • reset

        @Deprecated
public void reset()
        Deprecated. Use preExecute() method.
        Description copied from interface: Transform
        Resets the transform to the initial state (for another execution). This method may be called only if the transform was successfully initialized before.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface Transform
